unit: Unit 9 | Inference for Quantitative Data: Slopes
title: Which Test?
question_text: The $5$ following scenarios describe different significance tests.  One of them is a $t$ -test for slope, which one is it?

choices.text: High school students were asked both their ACT scores and their SAT scores.
High school students were asked if they took the ACT test.
Male and female high school students were asked their favorite subject out of math, English, science, and social studies.
Male and female high school students were asked their SAT scores.
High school students were asked whether they preferred math class or English class.
